      program combined
      implicit none
      integer(kind=8) :: n, k, temp
      integer :: k_int, i, j, remainder
      character(len=64) :: temp_str
      character(len=:), allocatable :: bin_str
      integer(kind=8), parameter :: M = 1000000007_8
      integer(kind=8) :: dp0, dp1, total

      read(*,*) n

      ! Compute popcount of n
      k = 0
      temp = n
      do while (temp > 0)
          if (mod(temp, 2_8) == 1) k = k + 1
          temp = temp / 2
      end do
      k_int = int(k)

      ! Convert k_int to binary string
      if (k_int == 0) then
          bin_str = '0'
      else
          temp_str = repeat(' ', 64)
          temp = k_int
          i = 64
          do while (temp > 0)
              remainder = mod(temp, 2)
              if (remainder == 0) then
                  temp_str(i:i) = '0'
              else
                  temp_str(i:i) = '1'
              end if
              i = i - 1
              temp = temp / 2
          end do
          bin_str = temp_str(i+1:64)
      end if

      ! Initialize DP
      dp0 = 1_8
      dp1 = 0_8

      do j = 1, len(bin_str)
          if (bin_str(j:j) == '0') then
              dp1 = mod(3_8 * dp1, M)
          else
              dp1 = mod(dp0 + 3_8 * dp1, M)
              dp0 = mod(2_8 * dp0, M)
          end if
      end do

      total = mod(dp0 + dp1, M)
      write(*,*) total

      end program combined
